definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: When I arrived in Yarmouth , I went straight to Barkis's house.
sentences.chinese: 到达雅茅斯后，我径直来到了巴克斯家。

sentences.english: Paula Baxter says people still come to the library to borrow books and movies. But now they can also download e-books.
sentences.chinese: 保巴克斯特说，人们还是来图书馆借阅书籍和电影。

sentences.english: Without Ceres and Bacchus, Venus grows cold.
sentences.chinese: 离开克瑞斯和巴克斯，维纳斯便心灰意冷。

sentences.english: Both are known for their devotion to mentoring, Backus says.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯说，两人都以热心辅导学生而著称。

sentences.english: Moreover, in the church at the top of the painting of the god Bacchus.
sentences.chinese: 而且，在教堂的顶部，画上了酒神巴克斯。

sentences.english: Barkis lay silently there, not moving.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯静静地躺着，一动不动。

sentences.english: The driver is so angry that he throw Baxter into the river.
sentences.chinese: 那个驾驶员非常生气，他把巴克斯特扔进河里去了。

sentences.english: As Ham went out , I went upstairs to see poor Barkis.
sentences.chinese: 哈姆走后，我上楼去看可怜的巴克斯。

sentences.english: The child would grow up to be Bacchus, the great god of wine.
sentences.chinese: 这个婴儿就是大名鼎鼎的酒神巴克斯。

sentences.english: And you hired Keefer, and this man Baxter, to help you?
sentences.chinese: 这样你雇了基弗和那个男人巴克斯特来帮你吗？

sentences.english: “Golden mountain” against the background of Garden of Bacchus.
sentences.chinese: “金色山”的背景是酒神巴克斯花园。

sentences.english: The Barkers now have one more reason to love alpacas.
sentences.chinese: 现在的巴克斯有一个更有理由爱羊驼。

sentences.english: Now you'll have to return those sweets to Mr Baxter.
sentences.chinese: 现在你也应该把偷来的糖果还给老巴克斯特先生。

sentences.english: Barkis is a good man and I'm sure I'll be happy with him.
sentences.chinese: 巴克斯是个好人，我相信跟他一起生活会很快乐。

sentences.english: How many hayfields are there in a small rural town like Buxton?
sentences.chinese: 像巴克斯登这样的乡下地方，会有多少牧草地？

sentences.english: When we arrived in Yarmouth and got down from the cart, we said goodbye to Mr Barkis.
sentences.chinese: 我们到达雅茅斯，下了马车，与巴克斯先生道别。

definition: Hill (name)/Christopher Hill, US undersecretary of state of East Asian affairs
